changelogversion.changelogtext: [b]The Big Clean Up![/b]
[b]Added![/b] Network requirement verification for the background tasks.
[b]Added![/b] A limit for image cache (currently 50 MB).
[b]Changed![/b] Behavior of the Subscription system (now: clear cache before executing, don't do anything if network is absent, don't save to local if fetch failed).
[b]Changed![/b] Caching system, now much faster.
[b]Reduced![/b] Application's starting time.
[b]Reduced![/b] Application's size.
[b]Removed![/b] The Music Store.
[b]Removed![/b] The Music Player.
[b]Removed![/b] All Tutorials.
[b]Removed![/b] Server hosting icon and hosting section.
[b]Fixed![/b] (maybe) Bug causing multiple notification to appear.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 18.1[/b]
[b]Added![/b] A button to force a service call to execute background tasks.
[b]Fixed![/b] Premium was not working anymore due to the new site security.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing wrong item to show up as new content in Search n' Go due to wrong sorting.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing to display multiple times the change-log if the application was destroyed then reconstructed without being restarted.
[b]Removed![/b] @thegostisdead from the About page.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 18[/b]
[b]New![/b] Download confirmation dialog for items in Search n' Go.
[b]Added![/b] A video extractor for the Streamango plateform.
[b]Added![/b] Navigation buttons in the Manga Reader.
[b]Added![/b] Reload image button in the Manga Reader.
[b]Added![/b] A new Subscription list.
[b]Added![/b] BoxPlay Service settings in the Settings section.
[b]Changed![/b] MyList data management system, you will not lose anymore your list content.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing application to crash if an item were closed as soon as he open.
[b]Fixed! (maybe)[/b] Extractor thread was locked and forced the user to wait until he get the file size.
[b]Fixed![/b] Missing "http:" prefix for the Streamango video provider.
[b]Fixed![/b] Encoding problem in some provider causing some information to not be displayed.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 17[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Video Quality chooser for some video player.
[b]Added![/b] Apply search button in Search n' Go.
[b]Removed![/b] Christmas red theme.
[b]Fixed![/b] Wrong url with Full-Stream.co provider in Search n' Go.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing Adkami provider to not use some video player.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 16 - Look & Feel[/b]
[b]New![/b] Search n' Go interface design.
[b]New![/b] Search n' Go history page.
[b]Added![/b] Possibility to resume a search if you were leaving the fragment before its end.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing provider not working if the cache were cleared due to device memory limit reach.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug caused by bad callbacks management.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing progress-bar to overlap other elements.
[b]Disabled![/b] Broken provider: I-Animes (cloudflare protection bypass not working).
[b]Disabled![/b] Broken provider: HDSS.to (no extractor available).
[b]Removed![/b] Old unused code.
[b]Removed![/b] Old, bugged, material search bar from the Search n' Go.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 15[/b]
[b]Added![/b] I-Animes as a Search n' Go video provider.
[b]Added![/b] Support for Go Unlimited video extraction.
[b]Added![/b] Support for Vidlox video extraction.
[b]Upgraded![/b] Search n' Go data handling system.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 14[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Manga Nelo as a manga Search n' Go provider.
[b]Fixed![/b] Manga viewer was not displaying the right chapter's title.
[b]Christmas!!![/b]
[b]Changed![/b] Global theme to red (same as error color).
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 13[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Cloudflare security bypass [instable].
[b]Changed![/b] Completly reworked JapScan provider for Search n' Go.
[b]Fixed![/b] JapScan's manga extractor was not linked.
[b]Warning![/b] Weak devices will have a bad time while handling the JapScan provider.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 12.1[/b]
[b]Added![/b] One openload sub-domain.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug caused by missing a certain openload sub-domain in Premium.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 12[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Japscan as a manga Search n' Go provider.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 11[/b]
[b]New![/b] Search n' Go's Openload Video Extractor.
[b]Fixed![/b] JetAnime Search n' Go provider was not displaying data about your result.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 10.2[/b]
[b]New![/b] Search n' Go caching system.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing saved item not to receive new content due to unclearable-cache.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing application to crash due to android data transaction being too large if cache were too big.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing cache to be reset at every search, making it not that useful.
[b]Changed![/b] Caching strategy to weak referencing, clearing it if android need memory.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 10.1[/b]
[b]Fixed![/b] New JetAnime's links secutity system was crashing the application when trying to do an extraction in the Search n' Go.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 10[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Image Viewer to zoom on any image.
[b]Added![/b] HDSS.to as a video Search n' Go provider.
[b]Added![/b] Translation system for Search n' Go results item's type.
[b]Added![/b] Button to open in browser the Search n' Go result.
[b]Added![/b] Button to open in browser the Search n' Go result page of an item if the extraction fail.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug caused by some remaining debug test code in the ScanManga content extractor.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug caused by missing code for older device compability.
[b]Search n' Go Update PREVIEW 9[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Anime-Ultime as a video Search n' Go provider.
[b]Downloads & Bugs Fix[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Possibility to use ADM instead of default Android downloader for way more stability (disabled by default, available for module: Search n' Go, Store Video, Store Music).
[b]Changed![/b] Url (and name) of 2 Search n' Go providers.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing VOIRFILM.pro not to work (they change their url).
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing application to crash if you were closing almost imediatly after opening an item in Search n' Go.
[b]Fixed![/b] Invalid date of the previous update's changelog.
[b]OPTIMIZE ME UPDATE![/b]
[b]New![/b] BoxPlay Icons, and ending halloween theme.
[b]New![/b] Error handler, completly reworked.
[b]Added![/b] Prompt you if you want to set the episode as "watched" if you have watch more than 80% of the video.
[b]Upgraded![/b] Episode list system, the response time will be faster.
[b]Upgraded![/b] Search n' Go search result list system.
[b]Upgraded![/b] Search n' Go result details list system.
[b]Updated![/b] @Paradox's status to Creative Assistant.
[b]Updated![/b] Almost every icon, for a better version.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing application to crash when starting a download.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug from the Adkami Search n' Go provider causing the season to be "null"
[b]Halloween!!![/b]
[b]Added![/b] New about page.
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug that was causing the About page to recreate if you click on it when it already been shown.
[b]Fixed![/b] Minor bugs.
[b]Removed![/b] Libraries page in the About section. (no up-to-date)
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 8.1[/b]
[b]Fixed![/b] Provider VOIRFILM.pro was sometimes locking search due to bad processing
[b]Fixed![/b] Providers VOIRFILM.pro and FilmStream.nu was showing "Disabled" to every movie/series
[b]Fixed![/b] When rotating, some list were not applying new size to their items
[b]Changed![/b] Extraction system of certain module
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 8[/b]
[b]Added![/b] New Manga and Novel Provider: Scan-Manga
[b]Added![/b] Novel Text Reader
[b]Fixed![/b] VoirFilm url has been changed
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 7.1[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Possibility to search Hentai on Adkami
[b]Added![/b] Possibility clear search history
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 7[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Fully added Full-Stream.nu as a video provider
[b]Theoretical values:[/b]
- JetAnime: +1300 Anime
- Manga-LEL: +350 Manga
- Adkami: +2100 Anime, +300 Series, +330 Hentai, +200 Drama
- VOIRFILM.bz: +220 Series, +2500 Movie
- Full-Stream.nu: +3600 Series, +10'000 Movie
[b]TOTAL:[/b] +3400 Anime, +350 Manga, +330 Hentai, +200 Drama, +4120 Series, +12'500 Movie
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 6.1[/b]
[b]Quick Fix![/b] Changed code for older Android version
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 6[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Adkami as a video provider
[b]Added![/b] Possibility to chose source player if page have multiple
[b]Added![/b] Download confirm dialog showing file size
[b]Fixed![/b] A bug causing restoration to apply an empty string for Search n' Go
[b]Unresolvable Bug![/b] The Watch Later list will remove all Search n' Go element if you upgrade version
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 5 + Watch Later List[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Cache version for offline checking
[b]Fixed![/b] Manga Reader, if activity killed, now restore actual page
[b]Fixed![/b] Search n' Go Provider Settings validate and cancel button was not translated
[b]Fixed![/b] Update value was not updating when refresh
[b]Fixed![/b] Serialized-Elements were not linked to the original
[b]Fixed![/b] (Maybe) Bug were the snackbar was displaying "downloading..." indefinetly if you network were too quick
[b]Fixed![/b] (Maybe) Bug were the application was crashing due to a bad Dynamic-NavigationView restoration
[b]BoxPlay Core Big Work 1[/b]
[b]Added![/b] Support for weak and older smartphone
[b]Changed![/b] Serialization added for everything in BoxPlay
[b]Fixed![/b] BoxPlay Core is now more stable
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug causing item to be forgot and application was crashing
[b]Fixed![/b] Managers was using wrong context, they now use the application main context
[b]Fixed![/b] Video Activity was crashing due to forgot configuration section
[b]Fixed![/b] Lot of managers was using a wrong UI context, and were causing NullPointerException because of this
[b]Fixed![/b] WorkingProgressDialog is now a full usable dialog (used in Premium and now in Search n' Go)
[b]Fixed![/b] Almost full BoxPlay Activity restoration if she was killed
[b]Fixed![/b] ... a lot of little one fixed too ...
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 4[/b]
[b]New![/b] Primtive video download button
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 3[/b]
[b]New![/b] Primitive Manga Reader
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 2[/b]
[b]New![/b] Site: VOIRFILM.bz
[b]Fixed![/b] Extractor was not checking if the streaming was possible before processing the page
[b]Search n' Go PREVIEW 1[/b]
[b]New![/b] UI Icons
[b]New![/b] Search n' Go Page
[b]New![/b] Video extractor
[b]New![/b] Search engine
[b]Fixed![/b] Bugs in the library page causing the Tabs not fully scrolling
[b]Optimized![/b] BoxPlay3 Core Library
[b]UI Rework Update (with Quentin)[/b]
[b]New![/b] UI Design
[b]New![/b] App relunch itself when changing language
[b]Fixed![/b] Some bugs
[b]Optimized![/b] Tutorials engine
[b]Premium Update[/b]
[b]New![/b] Premium Features
[b]New![/b] BoxPlay3 Icon
[b]Fixed![/b] Some bug that was causing unexpected crash when restoring the app
[b]Music Player Update[/b]
[b]New![/b] Music Player
[b]New![/b] Button for any music (play after current and add to queue)
[b]Info![/b] Reduced card size, for more intuitive navigation
[b]Optimized![/b] Highest image source calculator
[b]Tutorials Update[/b]
[b]New![/b] Tutorials for dummies
[b]New![/b] Hosting Tab in About sections
[b]New![/b] Video will be checking on what server there are on
[b]Added![/b] Possibility to reset tutorials progress (settings)
[b]Fixed![/b] A lot of typo (but a lot are still remaining)
[b]Started![/b] Working on a new API with Fabien
[b]Music Update[/b]
[b]Author or Band support[/b]
[b]Ask me to add song[/b]
[b]Primitive player for the moement (VLC)[/b]
[b]Possibility to travel throught music library[/b]
[b]Possibility select our music style[/b]
[b]--- Other change[/b]
[b]New![/b] Music tab for the BoxPlay Store
[b]New![/b] Research feature; more optimized now, and also linked between Store
[b]Added![/b] Possibility to clear image cache (settings)
[b]Added![/b] Possibility force factory to work (settings)
[b]Added![/b] Possibility remove the feature that lock the back button (settings)
[b]Changed![/b] And Polished a lot of the card design
[b]Fixed![/b] A bug that were unselecting menu if it was already clicked
[b](Possibly) Fixed![/b] A bug that caused image to be square, ramdomly append, don\'t know why...
[b]Welcome![/b] Dorian HARDY to our team! As a quick-hosting provider
[b]New![/b] Youtube Video Quick Downloader
[b]Added![/b] English SubTitled French Language
[b]Added![/b] New settings for background tasks, language and crash-reporting
[b]Added![/b] Per-Video overriding data (video url and language)
[b]Changed[/b] episode language disposition
[b]Changed[/b] language traduction
[b]Optimizing![/b] Video Factory, will change soon to a File Factory (seems like a hint to soon update ;))
[b]Fixed![/b] Bug that was crashing the app if you have no connection
[b]Changed[/b] design on various elements
[b]Optimized![/b] User interface
[b]Fixed![/b] A bug, that if VLC was returning an error, the application was crashing
[b]New![/b] Crash reporter
[b]New![/b] Changelog category in About page
[b]New![/b] Search bar
[b]Fixed![/b] Typo in the description (french language)
[b]Fixed![/b] BoxPlay Activity was restarting if you were canceling Video Activity with aciton bar button
[b]Starting[/b] working on settings
[b] The futur is now [/b]
[b]New![/b] Interface.
[b]New![/b] BoxPlay Engine.
[b]I re-done everything...[/b] so any of previous changelog is wrong.
VideoFactory üè≠ üè≠ üè≠
[b]Optimized![/b] Parsing BoxPlay server's data
[b]Added![/b] Now see the update name when the update ask you if you want to download the new version
[b]Created![/b] Own BoxPlay library! FINALLY!
[b]BoxPlay PC (Java) developement started![/b]

[b]Info[/b] Application architecture will change a lot to be compatible cross-plateform (PC, Phone, Web, ...), crash might occurs. If the application crashed for you, please tell me, BoxPlay automatically create a dump of the stacktrace before dieing (that help me to fix them!)
CDN UPDATE!
[b]Added![/b] CDN Explorer
[b]Added![/b] CDN Management
[b]VLC GOT SOME BUGS, SO YOU NEED TO CLICK MULTIPLES TIME ON THE SAME ITEM IF THAT NOT WORKING AT FIRST TRY[/b]
[b]ONLY USABLE WHEN CDN IS ONLINE, CDN=MY COMPUTER[/b]
Demo available on my Youtube channel if you want to see how it work!
[b]Added![/b] CDNs, Content Delivery Network, direct access of my hard drives for more animes, but will not be as beautiful as the main menu, that for fast delivery only!
[b]Added![/b] You can now reset the fast and local cache
[b]Added![/b] Color for video in video lists, for easiest reading
[b]New![/b] Color for the video group "Serie", is now easier to read
[b]Fixed![/b] OAV, SPECIAL and MOVIES for Anime finally work!
[b]Added![/b] This change log display
[b]Removed![/b] Anoying "Hey!! Register an account" message
[b]Fixed![/b] Saving progression work again! (optimized too)
[b]Fixed![/b] App was crashing if the server was unreachable
[b]Fixed![/b] Image loader/downloader
[b]Fixed![/b] Android Update Version (officially)
[b]Fixed![/b] Various bugs
[b]Added![/b] Optimization
[b]Added![/b] Login/Register system
[b]Break![/b] Progression saving system
Everything has been updated!
Some other changes I can't quite remember
[b]New![/b] Beautiful new interface!!!
[b]New![/b] Optimized json fetching
[b]Added![/b] New video type support
[b]New![/b] Episode System
[b]Optimized![/b] VLC API
[b]Fixed![/b] VLC error if video failed fetching
[b]New![/b] Login system
[b]New![/b] Sync. system
[b]Optimized![/b] API
[b]Fixed![/b] VLC not starting at saved time
[b]Fixed![/b] Infinite login loop in the code, API overloaded
First release
